stack.description: A collection of tools from the QUT CyPhy Lab in Brisbane, Australia. The tools facilitate an off-the-shelf visual SLAM system, providing integral components (Visual Odometry, Appearance Matching and Graph Building and Optimization) and the 'glue' to connect them.
stack.author: Maintained by Liz Murphy (liz.murphy@qut.edu.au) and Timothy Morris (timothy.morris@qut.edu.au)
